alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 12:13AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jackson, northeastern Madison, southeastern Lincoln and southwestern Franklin Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1213 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Huntland, or 16 miles south of Winchester, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hollywood, Huntland, Skyline, New Market, Pleasant Groves, Hytop, Martintown, Princeton, Plevna and Jericho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
